Text:
There will be no new GH episodes until next Monday.

So, Happy Christmas everyone!!!
Claudia
Thank you very much ClaudiaZ for the upload and Happy Christmas to you too.
Thank you very much ClaudiaZ! Happy holidays for you too from Greece!
Can anyone post the Metro Court reruns please. Thank you

Hi ClaudiaZ!

We had a hot Christmas here in Australia. I hope you had a great holiday.

Thanks for another year of uploads!

Happy New Year,

SamsStar
Hej Claudia!  Thanks so much for GH!  I have missed so much living in Sweden and am so grateful to be able to watch GH again!!  Will you be downloading the episodes this week (27-29 december)?

Thank you all for your words!! It's a pleasure for me being here!! I'm uploading Monday's ep in a while, but I'll be out for some days, so I'll upload episodes from 28 and 29 Dec. next Monday. There are no new episodes on Thursday and Friday.
